patterns: Which type of rubber products do you offer?
What type of rubber do you deal with?
responses: We manufacture the following products : Rubber moulded products , Rubber seals, Rubber Rings , Rubber O-Rings , Rubber caps

patterns: Which type of rubber moulded products do you offer?
What type of rubber moulded products do you deal with?
responses: We manufacture the following products Rubber moulded products: Transformer Rubber washers (Nitrile Rubber), Rubber pistons for PVC pipe industry , Rubber bushes , Rubber couplings , Rubber gaskits

patterns: Which type of rubber seals do you offer?
What type of rubber seals do you deal with?
What type of rubber seals do you supply?
What are the different rubber seals you manufacture ?
responses: We manufacture the following products Rubber Seals: U-Seals , V-shape Rubber Seals , Wiper Rubber seals , W-Rubber Seals

patterns: Which type of Rubber Rings do you offer?
What type of Rubber Rings do you deal with?
What are the different rubber rings you manufacture ?
responses: We manufacture the following products Rubber Rings : Slitting line machine rubber spacer , Impact rubber rings

patterns: Which type of rubber O Rings do you offer?
What type of rubber O Rings do you deal with?
What are the different rubber O rings you manufacture ?
responses: We manufacture the following products Rubber O-Rings : Rubber O-Rings
